main¶

Tracktor Server API

This is the Flask backend for the Tracktor VFX production tracker. The file contains endpoints to connect incoming requests to their respective functions and db access.

tracktor_server.main.add_note(project_id, item_type, item_id, item_dept)¶

Adds a note for a specific item and department in a project.

Parameters:

  • project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

  • item_type (str) – The type of item.

  • item_id (int) – The ID of the item.

  • item_dept (str) – The department.

Request JSON:

note_body (str): The content of the note.

Returns:

JSON dict with the new note, or error.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.change_asset_status(project_id, asset_id)¶

Updates the status of a specific asset (MOD, LIT, etc).

Parameters:

  • project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

  • asset_id (int) – The ID of the asset.

Request JSON:

status_item (str): The status field to update. value (str): The new status value.

Returns:

JSON message confirming update or error.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.change_shot_status(project_id, shot_id)¶

Updates the status of a specific shot (LAY, ANI, etc)

Parameters:

  • project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

  • shot_id (int) – The ID of the shot.

Request JSON:

status_item (str): The status field to update. value (str): The new status value.

Returns:

JSON message confirming update or error.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.create_asset(project_id)¶

Creates a new asset for a project.

Parameters:

project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

Request JSON:

asset_name (str): The name of the asset. asset_type (str): The type of the asset.

Returns:

JSON dict with the new asset, or error.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.create_new_user()¶

Creates a new user in the db.

Request JSON:

user_name (str): The username. user_password (str): The plaintext password.

Returns:

JSON message confirming creation or error.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.create_project()¶

Creates a new project. The user, creating it is assigned as Admin.

Request JSON:

name (str): Project name. user_id (int): ID of the user creating the project. type (str): Project type. shotsNum (int): Number of shots. deadline (str): Project deadline.

Returns:

JSON with new project ID and name.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.create_shot(project_id)¶

Creates a new shot for a project.

Parameters:

project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

Request JSON:

shot_name (str): The name of the shot.

Returns:

JSON dict with the new shot, or error.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.delete_project(project_id)¶

Removes the project and its contents from the db.

Parameters:

project_id (int) – The ID of the project to delete.

Returns:

JSON message confirming deletion.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.display_asset(project_id, asset_id)¶

Gets a specific asset from a project.

Parameters:

  • project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

  • asset_id (int) – The ID of the asset.

Returns:

JSON dict with the asset.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.display_assets_for_project(project_id)¶

Gets details of all assets for a specific project.

Parameters:

project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

Returns:

JSON list of asset dicts with the same project_id.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.display_notes(project_id, item_type, item_id, item_dept)¶

Gets all notes for the item.

Parameters:

  • project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

  • item_type (str) – The type of item (e.g., ‘shot’, ‘asset’).

  • item_id (int) – The ID of the item.

  • item_dept (str) – The department.

Returns:

JSON list of note dicts.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.display_project(project_id)¶

Gets the data of a specified project.

Parameters:

project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

Returns:

JSON dict with project data.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.display_shot(project_id, shot_id)¶

Gets a specific shot from a project.

Parameters:

  • project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

  • asset_id (int) – The ID of the shot.

Returns:

JSON dict with the shot.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.display_shots_for_project(project_id)¶

Gets details of all shots for a specific project.

Parameters:

project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

Returns:

JSON list of shot dicts with the same project_id.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.existing_assets()¶

Gets all assets from the db.

Returns:

JSON list of assets dicts.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.existing_assignments()¶

Gets all assignments from the db.

Parameters:

user_id (int, optional)

Returns:

JSON list of assignment dicts if no user specified, or JSON list if project IDs, assigned to the user.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.existing_notes()¶

Gets all nodes from the db.

Returns:

JSON list of node dicts.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.existing_projects()¶

Gets all projects from the db.

Returns:

JSON list of project dicts.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.existing_shots()¶

Gets all shots from the db.

Returns:

JSON list of shot dicts.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.existing_users()¶

Gets all users from the db, excluding passwords.

Returns:

JSON list of user dicts.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.init_db()¶

Initialises all the tables in the database.

Returns:

JSON message confirming the init.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.join_project()¶

Adds a user to a project using a share code.

Request JSON:

sharecode (str): The project share code. user_id (int): The ID of the user joining.

Returns:

JSON message confirming join or error.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.login_user()¶

Authenticates a user with username and password.

Request JSON:

user_name (str): The username. user_password (str): The plaintext password.

Returns:

JSON with success status and user ID, or error message.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.ping()¶

Health check endpoint to verify API is reachable.

Used in Tracktor plugin for TIK Manager.

Returns:

JSON message confirming API is reachable.

Return type:

Response

tracktor_server.main.share_project(project_id)¶

Generates or gets a share code for a project.

Parameters:

project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

Returns:

JSON with share code or error.

Return type:

Response
